    • Constructor Detail

      • ClosableSurface

        public ClosableSurface(android.graphics.SurfaceTexture surfaceTexture)
        Create Surface from a SurfaceTexture.

        Images drawn to the Surface will be made available to the SurfaceTexture, which can attach them to an OpenGL ES texture via SurfaceTexture.updateTexImage().

        Parameters:
        surfaceTexture - The SurfaceTexture that is updated by this Surface.
        Throws:
        OutOfResourcesException - if the surface could not be created.
